actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.

official_title: A bill to establish an Office of Indian Treaty Conflict Resolution.
short_title: Indian Treaty Conflict Resolution Act of 1990

summary.text: Indian Treaty Conflict Resolution Act of 1990 - Establishes the Office of Indian Treaty Conflict Resolution to provide mediation and conciliation services between Indian tribes and other entities arising out of the exercise by a tribe or its members of rights to use natural resources determined by a Federal court to be reserved by such tribe in a treaty with the United States. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Indian Treaty Conflict Resolution Act of 1990
A bill to establish an Office of Indian Treaty Conflict Resolution.
